content.raw:
I'm okay with this just being a smoke test to make sure that nothing suddenly "breaks" with these particular options. However, is there anyway to validate the output of the touchstone you've submitted here? Is there any good way of validating that the output in touchstone is actually proving that minibatch and validation are working and doing the "right thing"?

The last two points may not be necessary but it would be nice to see if there was a quick way of checking that touchstone is "correct".
content.html:
I'm okay with this just being a smoke test to make sure that nothing suddenly "breaks" with these particular options. However, is there anyway to validate the output of the touchstone you've submitted here? Is there any good way of validating that the output in touchstone is actually proving that minibatch and validation are working and doing the "right thing"?

The last two points may not be necessary but it would be nice to see if there was a quick way of checking that touchstone is "correct".
